bibl.title: An Ab Epistulis Graecis and Praefectus Vigilum from Egypt.

bibl.note: Reproduit de: Mélanges d'histoire ancienne offerts à William Seston (Paris, 1974) pp. 217-225. The origin and career of Valerius Titanianus, praefectus vigilum in the latter part of 217.
bibl.seg: Gilliam James Frank, An Ab Epistulis Graecis and Praefectus Vigilum from Egypt.
